creator: Yocto Enterprise
descriptionHtml:
Best notepad on earth.

WeNote is a simple and easy to use note taking app. You can create color notes, to-do lists, reminders and calendar quickly.

You can lock notes and to-do lists via PIN, pattern, password or fingerprint, to protect confidential information.

When you write down notes, emails, phone numbers, messages, cooking recipes, diary, journal, shopping lists and to-do lists, you will realize this is the easiest and quickest to use notepad on earth. 😁

WeNote is a privacy-focused notepad. WeNote can work offline perfectly, even without Internet connection. No login required.

You may jot down note on the go, if anything came across your mind. No complicated step. No internet required. Once you see WeNote, you will instantly know how to use it to organize your life.

WeNote enables effortless setup reminder by taking notes on the calendar. WeNote reminds you of the saved note on the date, so that you will never miss anything important.

WeNote makes note taking so much easy!


Features
• Create color notes and to-do lists
• Organize using label and color
• Labels designed as tabs, to let you swipe between labels in blazing fast speed
• Pictures as attachment. A picture is worth a thousand words. You can add unlimited pictures into a note
• Drawing and handwriting as attachment
• Audio recording allows hands free note-taking. You can add unlimited audio recordings into a note. (Premium)
• Lock app, notes and to-do lists via PIN, pattern, password or fingerprint
• Completed to-do lists will move to bottom
• Customize via various fonts, viewing modes and sorting modes
• 11 different color themes including French rose pink. You can change the app color theme based on your personal taste. (Premium)
• Unlimited color choices are available for you to categorize and organize notes easily. (Premium)
• Reminders and calendar, with lunar calendar supported
• Advanced reminder. Able to repeat daily, weekly, monthly, yearly, and highly customizable
• Stick note to status bar
• Secure sync to cloud storage
• Local backup and restore
• Share note and attachment to email, SMS, social networking & messaging apps
• Accept shared note and attachment from other apps
• Switch between note and to-do lists, seamlessly
• Search notes and to-do lists, instantly
• Various types of home widget - Note list (Premium), Calendar (Premium), Quick add, Sticky note


Free Trial
7 days free trial is provided for every premium feature. You may extend free trial period, by watching rewarded video ad.


Data Reliability
We place great emphasis on data reliability. We provide 2 reliable ways, to ensure you will never lose any notes, to-do lists, attachments.

• Secure sync to cloud storage: This is the most recommended way, to avoid data loss. After sync, the data is stored in cloud storage App Data folder. For security purpose, cloud storage App Data folder is not visible to user.

• Local backup and restore: If you have privacy concern on storing the data in cloud storage, you may use this way to avoid data loss. Backups are removed when WeNote is uninstalled.

Of course, you may choose to use both ways too.

Please refer to https://www.wenote.me/faq#h.p_MCAbHUyem5hi if you can't sync to cloud storage.


Reminder
Reminder doesn't work reliably for certain devices. Their over aggressive Battery management mode, have prevent reminder to work in background. Please turn off that "feature", allow WeNote runs in background, if you want reminder to work reliably.

Please read https://www.wenote.me/faq#h.p_NpdSxR34YQaj for solution.


Home Widget
Long press on desktop home screen, you may choose between various home widgets.

When you write down notes, emails, phone numbers, messages, cooking recipes, diary, journal, shopping lists and to-do lists, you will realize this is the easiest and quickest to use notepad on earth. 😁

WeNote is a privacy-focused notepad. WeNote can work offline perfectly, even without Internet connection. No login required.

You may jot down note on the go, if anything came across your mind. No complicated step. No internet required. Once you see WeNote, you will instantly know how to use it to organize your life.

WeNote enables effortless setup reminder by taking notes on the calendar. WeNote reminds you of the saved note on the date, so that you will never miss anything important.

WeNote makes note taking so much easy!


Features
• Create color notes and to-do lists
• Organize using label and color
• Labels designed as tabs, to let you swipe between labels in blazing fast speed
• Pictures as attachment. A picture is worth a thousand words. You can add unlimited pictures into a note
• Drawing and handwriting as attachment
• Audio recording allows hands free note-taking. You can add unlimited audio recordings into a note. (Premium)
• Lock app, notes and to-do lists via PIN, pattern, password or fingerprint
• Completed to-do lists will move to bottom
• Customize via various fonts, viewing modes and sorting modes
• 11 different color themes including French rose pink. You can change the app color theme based on your personal taste. (Premium)
• Unlimited color choices are available for you to categorize and organize notes easily. (Premium)
• Reminders and calendar, with lunar calendar supported
• Advanced reminder. Able to repeat daily, weekly, monthly, yearly, and highly customizable
• Stick note to status bar
• Secure sync to cloud storage
• Local backup and restore
• Share note and attachment to email, SMS, social networking & messaging apps
• Accept shared note and attachment from other apps
• Switch between note and to-do lists, seamlessly
• Search notes and to-do lists, instantly
• Various types of home widget - Note list (Premium), Calendar (Premium), Quick add, Sticky note


Free Trial
7 days free trial is provided for every premium feature. You may extend free trial period, by watching rewarded video ad.


Data Reliability
We place great emphasis on data reliability. We provide 2 reliable ways, to ensure you will never lose any notes, to-do lists, attachments.

• Secure sync to cloud storage: This is the most recommended way, to avoid data loss. After sync, the data is stored in cloud storage App Data folder. For security purpose, cloud storage App Data folder is not visible to user.

• Local backup and restore: If you have privacy concern on storing the data in cloud storage, you may use this way to avoid data loss. Backups are removed when WeNote is uninstalled.

Of course, you may choose to use both ways too.

Please refer to https://www.wenote.me/faq#h.p_MCAbHUyem5hi if you can't sync to cloud storage.


Reminder
Reminder doesn't work reliably for certain devices. Their over aggressive Battery management mode, have prevent reminder to work in background. Please turn off that "feature", allow WeNote runs in background, if you want reminder to work reliably.

Please read https://www.wenote.me/faq#h.p_NpdSxR34YQaj for solution.


Home Widget
Long press on desktop home screen, you may choose between various home widgets.

creator: Yocto Enterprise
descriptionHtml:
Best notepad on earth.

WeNote is a simple and easy to use note taking app. You can create color notes, to-do lists, reminders and calendar quickly.

You can lock notes and to-do lists via PIN, pattern, password or fingerprint, to protect confidential information.

When you write down notes, emails, phone numbers, messages, cooking recipes, diary, journal, shopping lists and to-do lists, you will realize this is the easiest and quickest to use notepad on earth. 😁

WeNote is a privacy-focused notepad. WeNote can work offline perfectly, even without Internet connection. No login required.

You may jot down note on the go, if anything came across your mind. No complicated step. No internet required. Once you see WeNote, you will instantly know how to use it to organize your life.

WeNote enables effortless setup reminder by taking notes on the calendar. WeNote reminds you of the saved note on the date, so that you will never miss anything important.

WeNote makes note taking so much easy!


Features
• Create color notes and to-do lists
• Organize using label and color
• Labels designed as tabs, to let you swipe between labels in blazing fast speed
• Pictures as attachment. A picture is worth a thousand words. You can add unlimited pictures into a note
• Drawing and handwriting as attachment
• Audio recording allows hands free note-taking. You can add unlimited audio recordings into a note. (Premium)
• Lock app, notes and to-do lists via PIN, pattern, password or fingerprint
• Completed to-do lists will move to bottom
• Customize via various fonts, viewing modes and sorting modes
• 11 different color themes including French rose pink. You can change the app color theme based on your personal taste. (Premium)
• Unlimited color choices are available for you to categorize and organize notes easily. (Premium)
• Reminders and calendar, with lunar calendar supported
• Advanced reminder. Able to repeat daily, weekly, monthly, yearly, and highly customizable
• Show holidays on calendar, which supports up to 250 countries, 3,680 states & provinces
• Stick note to status bar
• Secure sync to cloud storage
• Local backup and restore
• Share note and attachment to email, SMS, social networking & messaging apps
• Accept shared note and attachment from other apps
• Switch between note and to-do lists, seamlessly
• Search notes and to-do lists, instantly
• Various types of home widget - Note list (Premium), Calendar (Premium), Quick add, Sticky note


Free Trial
7 days free trial is provided for every premium feature. You may extend free trial period, by watching rewarded video ad.


Data Reliability
We place great emphasis on data reliability. We provide 2 reliable ways, to ensure you will never lose any notes, to-do lists, attachments.

• Secure sync to cloud storage: This is the most recommended way, to avoid data loss. After sync, the data is stored in cloud storage App Data folder. For security purpose, cloud storage App Data folder is not visible to user.

• Local backup and restore: If you have privacy concern on storing the data in cloud storage, you may use this way to avoid data loss. Backups are removed when WeNote is uninstalled.

Of course, you may choose to use both ways too.

Please refer to https://www.wenote.me/faq#h.p_MCAbHUyem5hi if you can't sync to cloud storage.


Reminder
Reminder doesn't work reliably for certain devices. Their over aggressive Battery management mode, have prevent reminder to work in background. Please turn off that "feature", allow WeNote runs in background, if you want reminder to work reliably.

Please read https://www.wenote.me/faq#h.p_NpdSxR34YQaj for solution.


Home Widget
Long press on desktop home screen, you may choose between various home widgets.

WeNote enables effortless setup reminder by taking notes on the calendar. WeNote reminds you of the saved note on the date, so that you will never miss anything important.

WeNote makes note taking so much easy!


Features
• Create color notes and to-do lists
• Organize using label and color
• Labels designed as tabs, to let you swipe between labels in blazing fast speed
• Pictures as attachment. A picture is worth a thousand words. You can add unlimited pictures into a note
• Drawing and handwriting as attachment
• Audio recording allows hands free note-taking. You can add unlimited audio recordings into a note. (Premium)
• Lock app, notes and to-do lists via PIN, pattern, password or fingerprint
• Completed to-do lists will move to bottom
• Customize via various fonts, viewing modes and sorting modes
• 11 different color themes including French rose pink. You can change the app color theme based on your personal taste. (Premium)
• Unlimited color choices are available for you to categorize and organize notes easily. (Premium)
• Reminders and calendar, with lunar calendar supported
• Advanced reminder. Able to repeat daily, weekly, monthly, yearly, and highly customizable
• Show holidays on calendar, which supports up to 250 countries, 3,680 states & provinces
• Stick note to status bar
• Secure sync to cloud storage
• Local backup and restore
• Share note and attachment to email, SMS, social networking & messaging apps
• Accept shared note and attachment from other apps
• Switch between note and to-do lists, seamlessly
• Search notes and to-do lists, instantly
• Various types of home widget - Note list (Premium), Calendar (Premium), Quick add, Sticky note


Free Trial
7 days free trial is provided for every premium feature. You may extend free trial period, by watching rewarded video ad.


Data Reliability
We place great emphasis on data reliability. We provide 2 reliable ways, to ensure you will never lose any notes, to-do lists, attachments.

• Secure sync to cloud storage: This is the most recommended way, to avoid data loss. After sync, the data is stored in cloud storage App Data folder. For security purpose, cloud storage App Data folder is not visible to user.

WeNote enables effortless setup reminder by taking notes on the calendar. WeNote reminds you of the saved note on the date, so that you will never miss anything important.

WeNote makes note taking so much easy!


Features
• Create color notes and to-do lists
• Organize using label and color
• Labels designed as tabs, to let you swipe between labels in blazing fast speed
• Pictures as attachment. A picture is worth a thousand words. You can add unlimited pictures into a note
• Drawing and handwriting as attachment
• Audio recording allows hands free note-taking. You can add unlimited audio recordings into a note. (Premium)
• Lock app, notes and to-do lists via PIN, pattern, password or fingerprint
• Completed to-do lists will move to bottom
• Customize via various fonts, viewing modes and sorting modes
• 11 different color themes including French rose pink. You can change the app color theme based on your personal taste. (Premium)
• Unlimited color choices are available for you to categorize and organize notes easily. (Premium)
• Reminders and calendar, with lunar calendar supported
• Advanced reminder. Able to repeat daily, weekly, monthly, yearly, and highly customizable
• Show holidays on calendar, which supports up to 250 countries, 3,680 states & provinces
• Stick note to status bar
• Secure sync to cloud storage
• Local backup and restore
• Share note and attachment to email, SMS, social networking & messaging apps
• Accept shared note and attachment from other apps
• Switch between note and to-do lists, seamlessly
• Search notes and to-do lists, instantly
• Various types of home widget - Note list (Premium), Calendar (Premium), Quick add, Sticky note


Free Trial
7 days free trial is provided for every premium feature. You may extend free trial period, by watching rewarded video ad.


Data Reliability
We place great emphasis on data reliability. We provide 2 reliable ways, to ensure you will never lose any notes, to-do lists, attachments.

• Secure sync to cloud storage: This is the most recommended way, to avoid data loss. After sync, the data is stored in cloud storage App Data folder. For security purpose, cloud storage App Data folder is not visible to user.

• Local backup and restore: If you have privacy concern on storing the data in cloud storage, you may use this way to avoid data loss. Backups are removed when WeNote is uninstalled.

Of course, you may choose to use both ways too.

Please refer to https://www.wenote.me/faq#h.p_MCAbHUyem5hi if you can't sync to cloud storage.


Reminder
Reminder doesn't work reliably for certain devices. Their over aggressive Battery management mode, have prevent reminder to work in background. Please turn off that "feature", allow WeNote runs in background, if you want reminder to work reliably.

Please read https://www.wenote.me/faq#h.p_NpdSxR34YQaj for solution.


Home Widget
Long press on desktop home screen, you may choose between various home widgets.

creator: Yocto Enterprise
descriptionHtml:
Best notepad on earth.

WeNote is a simple and easy to use note taking app. You can create color notes, to-do lists, reminders and calendar quickly.

You can lock notes and to-do lists via PIN, pattern, password or fingerprint, to protect confidential information.

When you write down notes, emails, phone numbers, messages, cooking recipes, diary, journal, shopping lists and to-do lists, you will realize this is the easiest and quickest to use notepad on earth. 😁

WeNote is a privacy-focused notepad. WeNote can work offline perfectly, even without Internet connection. No login required.

You may jot down note on the go, if anything came across your mind. No complicated step. No internet required. Once you see WeNote, you will instantly know how to use it to organize your life.

WeNote enables effortless setup reminder by taking notes on the calendar. WeNote reminds you of the saved note on the date, so that you will never miss anything important.

WeNote makes note taking so much easy!


Features
• Create color notes and to-do lists
• Organize using label and color
• Labels designed as tabs, to let you swipe between labels in blazing fast speed
• Pictures as attachment. A picture is worth a thousand words. You can add unlimited pictures into a note
• Drawing and handwriting as attachment
• Audio recording allows hands free note-taking. You can add unlimited audio recordings into a note. (Premium)
• Lock app, notes and to-do lists via PIN, pattern, password or fingerprint
• Completed to-do lists will move to bottom
• Customize via various fonts, viewing modes and sorting modes
• 11 different color themes including French rose pink. You can change the app color theme based on your personal taste. (Premium)
• Unlimited color choices are available for you to categorize and organize notes easily. (Premium)
• Reminders and calendar, with lunar calendar supported
• Advanced reminder. Able to repeat daily, weekly, monthly, yearly, and highly customizable
• Show holidays on calendar, which supports up to 250 countries, 3,680 states & provinces
• Stick note to status bar
• Secure sync to cloud storage
• Local backup and restore
• Share note and attachment to email, SMS, social networking & messaging apps
• Accept shared note and attachment from other apps
• Switch between note and to-do lists, seamlessly
• Search notes and to-do lists, instantly
• Various types of home widget - Note list (Premium), Calendar (Premium), Quick add, Sticky note


Free Trial
7 days free trial is provided for every premium feature. You may extend free trial period, by watching rewarded video ad.


Data Reliability
We place great emphasis on data reliability. We provide 2 reliable ways, to ensure you will never lose any notes, to-do lists, attachments.

• Secure sync to cloud storage: This is the most recommended way, to avoid data loss. After sync, the data is stored in cloud storage App Data folder. For security purpose, cloud storage App Data folder is not visible to user. You may choose either Google Drive or WeNote Cloud as cloud storage provider.

• Local backup and restore: If you have privacy concern on storing the data in cloud storage, you may use this way to avoid data loss. Backups are removed when WeNote is uninstalled.

Of course, you may choose to use both ways too.

Please refer to https://www.wenote.me/faq#h.p_MCAbHUyem5hi if you can't sync to cloud storage.


Reminder
Reminder doesn't work reliably for certain devices. Their over aggressive Battery management mode, have prevent reminder to work in background. Please turn off that "feature", allow WeNote runs in background, if you want reminder to work reliably.

Please read https://www.wenote.me/faq#h.p_NpdSxR34YQaj for solution.


Home Widget
Long press on desktop home screen, you may choose between various home widgets.

creator: Yocto Enterprise
descriptionHtml:
Best notepad on earth.

WeNote is a simple and easy to use note taking app. You can create color notes, to-do lists, reminders and calendar quickly.

You can lock notes and to-do lists via PIN, pattern, password or fingerprint, to protect confidential information.

When you write down notes, emails, phone numbers, messages, cooking recipes, diary, journal, shopping lists and to-do lists, you will realize this is the easiest and quickest to use notepad on earth. 😁

WeNote is a privacy-focused notepad. WeNote can work offline perfectly, even without Internet connection. No login required.

You may jot down note on the go, if anything came across your mind. No complicated step. No internet required. Once you see WeNote, you will instantly know how to use it to organize your life.

WeNote enables effortless setup reminder by taking notes on the calendar. WeNote reminds you of the saved note on the date, so that you will never miss anything important.

WeNote makes note taking so much easy!


Features
• Create color notes and to-do lists
• Organize using label and color
• Labels designed as tabs, to let you swipe between labels in blazing fast speed
• Pictures as attachment. A picture is worth a thousand words. You can add unlimited pictures into a note
• Drawing and handwriting as attachment
• Audio recording allows hands free note-taking. You can add unlimited audio recordings into a note. (Premium)
• Lock app, notes and to-do lists via PIN, pattern, password or fingerprint
• Completed to-do lists will move to bottom
• Customize via various fonts, viewing modes and sorting modes
• 11 different color themes including French rose pink. You can change the app color theme based on your personal taste. (Premium)
• Unlimited color choices are available for you to categorize and organize notes easily. (Premium)
• Reminders and calendar, with lunar calendar supported
• Advanced reminder. Able to repeat daily, weekly, monthly, yearly, and highly customizable
• Show holidays on calendar, which supports up to 250 countries, 3,680 states & provinces
• Stick note to status bar
• Secure sync to cloud storage
• Local backup and restore
• Share note and attachment to email, SMS, social networking & messaging apps
• Accept shared note and attachment from other apps
• Switch between note and to-do lists, seamlessly
• Search notes and to-do lists, instantly
• Various types of home widget - Note list (Premium), Calendar (Premium), Quick add, Sticky note


Free Trial
7 days free trial is provided for every premium feature. You may extend free trial period, by watching rewarded video ad.


Data Reliability
We place great emphasis on data reliability. We provide 2 reliable ways, to ensure you will never lose any notes, to-do lists, attachments.

• Secure sync to cloud storage: This is the most recommended way, to avoid data loss. After sync, the data is stored in cloud storage App Data folder. For security purpose, cloud storage App Data folder is not visible to user. You may choose either Google Drive or WeNote Cloud as cloud storage provider.

• Local backup and restore: If you have privacy concern on storing the data in cloud storage, you may use this way to avoid data loss. Backups are removed when WeNote is uninstalled.

Of course, you may choose to use both ways too.

Please refer to https://www.wenote.me/faq#h.p_MCAbHUyem5hi if you can't sync to cloud storage.


Reminder
Reminder doesn't work reliably for certain devices. Their over aggressive Battery management mode, have prevent reminder to work in background. Please turn off that "feature", allow WeNote runs in background, if you want reminder to work reliably.

Please read https://www.wenote.me/faq#h.p_NpdSxR34YQaj for solution.


Home Widget
Long press on desktop home screen, you may choose between various home widgets.

descriptionHtml:
The Best Notes for Note Taking



⭐WeNote - Notes, Notepad, Notebook, Note taking app⭐ is a simple and easy to use note taking app. You can create color notes, to-do lists, reminders, and calendar quickly.

You can lock notes and to-do lists via PIN, pattern, password or fingerprint, to protect confidential information.

When you write down notes, emails, phone numbers, messages, cooking recipes, diary, journal, shopping lists, and to-do lists, you will realize this is the easiest and quickest to use notepad on earth. 😁

WeNote is a privacy-focused notepad. WeNote can work offline perfectly, even without an Internet connection. No login is required.

You may jot down notes on the go if anything came to your mind. No complicated step. No internet required. Once you see WeNote, you will instantly know how to use it to organize your life.


Notes Features


📝 Create color notes and to-do lists
📁 Organize notes using label and color
🚀 Labels designed as tabs, to let you swipe between notes at blazing fast speed
🖼️ Attach multiple images into notepad
🖌️ Draw and paint inside notepad
🎤 Audio recording allows hands-free notes taking. You can add unlimited audio recordings into notepad
🔒 Secure lock notes and keep notes private
✔️ Completed to-do lists will move to notes bottom
👀 Customize notes via various fonts, viewing modes, and sorting modes
🎀 11 different app color themes to make notepad looks great
🎨 Unlimited notes color choices are available
📅 Reminders notes and calendar, with a lunar calendar
🛎 Powerful notes reminder. Able to repeat daily, weekly, monthly, yearly, and highly customizable. Never miss anything
🎉 Show holidays on the calendar notes, which supports up to 250 countries, 3,680 states & provinces
☁️ Secure sync to WeNote Cloud or Google Drive cloud storage. Never lose any notes
⬆️ Local backup and restore to keep notes safe
👨‍👧‍👧 Share notes to email, SMS, social networking & messaging apps
🖨️ Send notes to printer or export notes to PDF
🔎 Search notes and to-do lists, instantly


Free Note Taking App


WeNote - Notes, Notepad, Notebook, Note taking app is a free note taking app for taking notes. Taking notes with WeNote® is easier than any other notepad or note taking app.


Color Notes


This notepad and notebook can help you categorize notes into different colors. You can manage notes with 12 pre-defined beautiful colors. WeNote® also allows you to choose an unlimited favorite color to personalize notes.


Notes Category


WeNote - Notes, Notepad, Notebook, Note taking app allows you to categorize notes by creating unlimited labels. Notes labels can display as Tabs. You may also display notes labels as menus based on personal preference.


Calendar Notes


WeNote - Notes, Notepad, Notebook, Note taking app has a calendar. You can note taking and create reminders in the calendar. The calendar can display public holidays. You'll never miss any important notes events.


Reminder Notes


This notes app makes it easy to setup notepad notes alarm. You'll never miss any important notepad notes.


Cooking Notes, School Notes, Work Notes


This awesome notepad is easy to take cooking notes, school notes and work notes. WeNote® is a notepad suitable for all age of life.


Secure Lock to Keep Notes Private


This notepad note can secure lock can help to keep notes private. Others are not able to view the locked notes. You can either lock a note, or lock the entire app to keep the notepad safe.


Backup and Restore Notes


This notepad can backup and restore notes from WeNote Cloud or Google Drive cloud. Never lose any notes. It is easy to share notes or import notes from another phone.


Sticky Notes Home Widget


Put notes on home screen. The sticky notes memo widget helps read quick notes and write quick notes.

creator: Notes Notepad
descriptionHtml:
The Best Notes for Note Taking



⭐WeNote - Notes, Notepad, Notebook, Note taking app⭐ is a simple and easy to use note taking app. You can create color notes, to-do list, reminders, and calendar quickly.

You can lock notes and to-do list via PIN, pattern, password or fingerprint, to protect confidential information.

When you write down notes, emails, phone numbers, messages, cooking recipes, diary, journal, shopping lists, and to-do list, you will realize this is the easiest and quickest to use notepad on earth. 😁

WeNote is a privacy-focused notepad. WeNote can work offline perfectly, even without an Internet connection. No login is required.

You may jot down notes on the go if anything came to your mind. No complicated step. No internet required. Once you see WeNote, you will instantly know how to use it to organize your life.

Notes Features


📝 Create color notes and to-do list
📁 Organize notes using label and color
🚀 Labels designed as tabs, to let you swipe between notes at blazing fast speed
🖼️ Attach multiple images into notepad
🖌️ Draw and paint inside notepad
🎤 Audio recording allows hands-free notes taking. You can add unlimited audio recordings into notepad
🔒 Secure lock notes and keep notes private
✔️ Completed to-do list will move to notes bottom
👀 Customize notes via various fonts, viewing modes, and sorting modes
🎀 11 different app color themes to make notepad looks great
🎨 Unlimited notes color choices
📅 Reminders notes and calendar, with a lunar calendar
🛎 Powerful notes reminder. Notepad able to repeat daily, weekly, monthly, yearly, and highly customizable. Never miss anything from notebook
🎉 Show holidays on the calendar notes, which supports up to 250 countries, 3,680 states & provinces
☁️ Secure sync to WeNote Cloud or Google Drive cloud storage. Never lose any notes
⬆️ Local backup and restore to keep notes safe
👨‍👧‍👧 Share notes to email, SMS, social networking & messaging apps
🖨️ Send notes to printer or export notes to PDF
🔎 Search notes and to-do list, instantly

Free Note Taking App


WeNote - Notes, Notepad, Notebook, Note taking app is a free note taking app for taking notes. Taking notes with WeNote® is easier than any other notepad or note taking app.

Color Notes


This notepad and notebook can help you categorize notes into different colors. Manage notes with 12 pre-defined beautiful colors. WeNote® also allows unlimited favorite color to personalize notes.

Notes Category


WeNote® allows you to categorize notes by creating unlimited labels. Notes labels can display as Tabs. or menus based on personal preference.

To-do list, Shopping list


WeNote® is a to-do app. Add many items to make a to-do list or a shopping list. Use a drag button to rearrange to-do list ordering. After an to-do item is finished, quick tap on it to mark to-do done. A completed to-do will move to the bottom of to-do list.

Calendar Notes


WeNote® has a calendar. You can note taking and create reminders in the calendar. The calendar can display public holidays. Never miss any important notes events.

Reminder Notes


This notes app makes it easy to setup notepad notes alarm. Never miss any important notepad notes.

Cooking Notes, School Notes, Work Notes


This awesome notebook is easy to take cooking notes, school notes and work notes. WeNote® is a notebook suitable for all age of life.

Secure Lock to Keep Notes Private


This notebook can secure lock and keep notes private. Others are not able to view the locked notes. You can either lock a note, or lock the entire app to keep the notebook safe.

Sticky Notes Home Widget


There are 4 different sticky notes. They are normal sticky notes, mini sticky notes, calendar sticky notes, and sticky note list. Place the sticky notes on home screen for quick notes access.
descriptionShort: Notes notepad to create color notes, to-do list, reminders & calendar quickly.

creator: Notes Notepad
descriptionHtml:
Easy to Use Notebook for Note Taking

⭐WeNote - Notes, Todo, Calendar⭐ is a simple and easy to use note taking app. You can create color notes, to-do lists, shopping lists, reminders, and calendars quickly.

You can lock notes and todo list via PIN, pattern, password or fingerprint, to protect confidential information.

When you write down memos, emails, phone numbers, messages, cooking recipes, diary, journal, shopping lists, and todo list, you will realize this is a simple and awesome notepad app. 😁

WeNote® is a privacy-focused notepad. WeNote® can work offline perfectly, even without an Internet connection. No login is required.

Note taking with WeNote® is easier than any other notepad or memo app.

You may jot down a note on the go if anything comes to your mind. There is no complicated step. No internet required. Once you see WeNote®, you will instantly know how to use it to organize your life.

📝 How to Take a Note?
WeNote® can act as a simple word processing app. You can type unlimited characters. After saving the note, you can pin it to the top screen, check off, password lock, stick to the notification bar, share or delete through the menu. When checking off a text note, WeNote® will strikethrough title and content.

✔️🛒 How to Make Todo List or Shopping List?
In todo list mode, you can add unlimited items and arrange their order with a simple tap and move. When finishing with an item, you can perform a simple tap to strikethrough it. After an item is checked, the item will move to the bottom to keep the list looking clean.

Features
📝 Create color notes and todo list
📁 Organize memo using label and color
🚀 Labels designed as tabs, to let you swipe between notes at blazing fast speed
🖼️ Attach photos and images into notebook
🖌️ Draw and paint inside the notepad
🎤 Voice recording allows hands-free note taking. You can add unlimited voice recordings into notepad
📌 Pin important notes to the top and stick notes to the notification bar. You will not miss out on any important thing
🗒️ Place 5 different types of sticky note home widgets on the home screen
🔒 Secure lock notes and keep them private
✔️ The completed to-do list will move to the bottom of the list
👀 Customize notes via various fonts, viewing modes, and sorting modes
🎀 11 different app color themes to make notebook looks great
🎨 Unlimited notes color choices
📅 Reminders memo and calendar, with a lunar calendar
🛎 Powerful notes reminder. Notepad able to repeat daily, weekly, monthly, yearly, and highly customizable. Never miss anything from the notebook
🎉 Show holidays on the calendar notes, which supports up to 250 countries, 3,680 states & provinces
☁️ Secure sync to WeNote® Cloud or Google Drive cloud storage. Never lose any notes
⬆️ Local backup and restore to keep notes safe
👨‍👧‍👧 Share notes to email, SMS, social networking & messaging apps
⏪ Undo/ redo enables mistake correction during note typing
🔗 Convert URL and phone number to clickable links
🖨️ Send notes to printer or export notes to PDF
🔎 Search notes and todo list, instantly

Color Notes
This notebook can help you categorize notes into different colors. Manage notes with 12 pre-defined beautiful colors. WeNote® also provides an unlimited favorite color.

Notes Category
WeNote® allows you to categorize notes by creating unlimited labels. Labels can display as Tabs. or menus based.

Calendar Memo
This notepad has a calendar. You can write a memo and create a reminder in the calendar. The calendar can display public holidays.

Secure Lock to Keep Notebook Private
This notepad can secure lock and keep notes private. You can either lock a note or lock the entire app to keep the notebook safe.

Sticky Notes Home Widget
There are 5 different widgets. They are normal sticky notes, mini sticky notes, quick-add memos, calendar memos, and note list. Place the widgets on the home screen for quick access.
descriptionShort: Easy to use notebook for notes, todo list, shopping list, reminders, calendar

creator: Yocto Enterprise
descriptionHtml:
Easy to Use Notebook for Note Taking

⭐WeNote - Notes, Todo, Calendar⭐ is a simple and easy to use note taking app. You can create color notes, to-do lists, shopping lists, reminders, and calendars quickly.

You can lock notes and todo list via PIN, pattern, password or fingerprint, to protect confidential information.

When you write down memos, emails, phone numbers, messages, cooking recipes, diary, journal, shopping lists, and todo list, you will realize this is a simple and awesome notepad app. 😁

WeNote® is a privacy-focused notepad. WeNote® can work offline perfectly, even without an Internet connection. No login is required.

Note taking with WeNote® is easier than any other notepad or memo app.

You may jot down a note on the go if anything comes to your mind. There is no complicated step. No internet required. Once you see WeNote®, you will instantly know how to use it to organize your life.

📝 How to Take a Note?
WeNote® can act as a simple word processing app. You can type unlimited characters. After saving the note, you can pin it to the top screen, check off, password lock, stick to the notification bar, share or delete through the menu. When checking off a text note, WeNote® will strikethrough title and content.

✔️🛒 How to Make Todo List or Shopping List?
In todo list mode, you can add unlimited items and arrange their order with a simple tap and move. When finishing with an item, you can perform a simple tap to strikethrough it. After an item is checked, the item will move to the bottom to keep the list looking clean.

Features
📝 Create color notes and todo list
📁 Organize memo using label and color
🚀 Labels designed as tabs, to let you swipe between notes at blazing fast speed
🖼️ Attach photos and images into notebook
🖌️ Draw and paint inside the notepad
🎤 Voice recording allows hands-free note taking. You can add unlimited voice recordings into notepad
📌 Pin important notes to the top and stick notes to the notification bar. You will not miss out on any important thing
🗒️ Place 5 different types of sticky note home widgets on the home screen
🔒 Secure lock notes and keep them private
✔️ The completed to-do list will move to the bottom of the list
👀 Customize notes via various fonts, viewing modes, and sorting modes
🎀 11 different app color themes to make notebook looks great
🎨 Unlimited notes color choices
📅 Reminders memo and calendar, with a lunar calendar
🛎 Powerful notes reminder. Notepad able to repeat daily, weekly, monthly, yearly, and highly customizable. Never miss anything from the notebook
🎉 Show holidays on the calendar notes, which supports up to 250 countries, 3,680 states & provinces
☁️ Secure sync to WeNote® Cloud or Google Drive cloud storage. Never lose any notes
⬆️ Local backup and restore to keep notes safe
👨‍👧‍👧 Share notes to email, SMS, social networking & messaging apps
⏪ Undo/ redo enables mistake correction during note typing
🔗 Convert URL and phone number to clickable links
🖨️ Send notes to printer or export notes to PDF
🔎 Search notes and todo list, instantly

Color Notes
This notebook can help you categorize notes into different colors. Manage notes with 12 pre-defined beautiful colors. WeNote® also provides an unlimited favorite color.

Notes Category
WeNote® allows you to categorize notes by creating unlimited labels. Labels can display as Tabs. or menus based.

Calendar Memo
This notepad has a calendar. You can write a memo and create a reminder in the calendar. The calendar can display public holidays.

Secure Lock to Keep Notebook Private
This notepad can secure lock and keep notes private. You can either lock a note or lock the entire app to keep the notebook safe.

Sticky Notes Home Widget
There are 5 different widgets. They are normal sticky notes, mini sticky notes, quick-add memos, calendar memos, and note list. Place the widgets on the home screen for quick access.

When you write down memos, emails, phone numbers, messages, cooking recipes, diary, journal, shopping lists, and to do list, you will realize this is a good notes taking app. 😁

WeNote is an ad-free notepad. No ads give the best notes taking experience.

WeNote® is a privacy-focused notepad. WeNote® can work offline perfectly, even without an Internet connection. No login is required.

Lock notes and to do list via PIN, pattern, password, or fingerprint, to protect confidential information.

📝 How to Take a Note?
WeNote® can act as a simple word processing app. You can type unlimited characters. After saving the note, you can pin it to the top screen, check off, password lock, stick to the notification bar, share or delete through the menu.

✔️🛒 How to Make Todo List or Shopping List?
In to-do list mode, you can add an unlimited checklist. Arrange their order with a simple tap and move. When finishing with an item, you can perform a simple tap to strikethrough it.

Features
📝 Create color notes and todo list
📁 Organize memo using label & color
🚀 Labels designed as tabs, to let you swipe between notes at blazing fast speed
🖼️ Attach photos and images into notebook
🖌️ Draw and paint inside the notepad
🎤 Voice recording allows hands-free note taking. You can add unlimited voice recordings into notepad
📌 Pin important notes to the top. Stick notes to the notification bar. You will not miss out on any important thing
🗒️ Place 5 different types of sticky note home widgets on the home screen
🔒 Secure lock notes and keep them private
✔️ The completed to-do list will move to the bottom of the checklist
👀 Customize notes via various fonts, viewing modes, sorting modes
🎀 11 different app color themes to make notebook looks great
🎨 Unlimited notes color choices
📅 Reminders memo and calendar, with a lunar calendar
🛎 Powerful notes reminder. Notepad able to repeat daily, weekly, monthly, yearly, and highly customizable. Never miss anything from the notebook
🎉 Show holidays on the calendar notes, which supports up to 250 countries, 3,680 states & provinces
☁️ Secure sync to WeNote® Cloud or Google Drive cloud storage. Never lose any notes
⬆️ Local backup and restore to keep notes safe
👨‍👧‍👧 Share notes to email, SMS, social networking & messaging apps
⏪ Undo/ redo enables mistake correction during note typing
🔗 Convert URL and phone number to clickable links
🖨️ Send notes to printer or export notes to PDF
🔎 Search notes and todo list, instantly

Color Notes
This notebook can categorize notes into different colors. Manage notes with 12 pre-defined beautiful colors. WeNote® also provides an unlimited favorite color.

Notes Category
WeNote® allows you to categorize notes by creating labels. Labels can display as Tabs, or menus based.

Calendar Memo
This notepad has a calendar. You can write a memo and create a reminder in the calendar. The calendar can display public holidays.

Due to its remarkable easy-to-use built-in calendar, you can use WeNote® as agenda planner and family organizer. Either plan next trip itinerary or schedule business meetings.

Secure Lock to Keep Notebook Private
This notepad can secure lock and keep notes private. Either lock a note or lock the entire app to keep the notebook safe.

Sticky Notes Home Widget
There are 5 different widgets. They are normal sticky notes, mini sticky notes, quick-add memos, calendar memos, and note list. Place the widgets on the home screen for quick access.

---

Due to its remarkable easy-to-use built-in calendar, you can use WeNote® as agenda planner and family organizer. Either plan next trip itinerary or schedule business meetings.

Secure Lock to Keep Notebook Private
This notepad can secure lock and keep notes private. Either lock a note or lock the entire app to keep the notebook safe.

Sticky Notes Home Widget
There are 5 different widgets. They are normal sticky notes, mini sticky notes, quick-add memos, calendar memos, and note list. Place the widgets on the home screen for quick access.

descriptionHtml:
Easy to Use Notebook for Note Taking



⭐WeNote: Notes Notebook Notepad⭐ is a simple and awesome note taking app. You can create color notes, to do lists, shopping lists, reminders, and calendars quickly.

Users love WeNote® as their life organizer, work planner, or study note app. Note taking with WeNote® is easier than any other notepad, memo app.

When you write down memos, emails, phone numbers, messages, cooking recipes, diary, journal, shopping lists, and to do list, you will realize this is a good notes taking app. 😁

WeNote is a notepad that provides the best notes taking experience.

WeNote® is a privacy-focused notepad. WeNote® can work offline perfectly, even without an Internet connection. No login is required.

Lock notes and to do list via PIN, pattern, password, or fingerprint, to protect confidential information.

📝 How to Take a Note?
WeNote® can act as a simple word processing app. You can type unlimited characters. After saving the note, you can pin it to the top screen, check off, password lock, stick to the notification bar, share or delete through the menu.

✔️🛒 How to Make Todo List or Shopping List?
In to-do list mode, you can add an unlimited checklist. Arrange their order with a simple tap and move. When finishing with an item, you can perform a simple tap to strikethrough it.

Features
📝 Create color notes and todo list
📁 Organize memo using label & color
🚀 Labels designed as tabs, to let you swipe between notes at blazing fast speed
🖼️ Attach photos and images into notebook
🖌️ Draw and paint inside the notepad
🎤 Voice recording allows hands-free note taking. You can add unlimited voice recordings into notepad
📌 Pin important notes to the top. Stick notes to the notification bar. You will not miss out on any important thing
🗒️ Place 5 different types of sticky note home widgets on the home screen
🔒 Secure lock notes and keep them private
✔️ The completed to-do list will move to the bottom of the checklist
👀 Customize notes via various fonts, viewing modes, sorting modes
🎀 11 different app color themes to make notebook looks great
🎨 Unlimited notes color choices
📅 Reminders memo and calendar, with a lunar calendar
🛎 Powerful notes reminder. Notepad able to repeat daily, weekly, monthly, yearly, and highly customizable. Never miss anything from the notebook
🎉 Show holidays on the calendar notes, which supports up to 250 countries, 3,680 states & provinces
☁️ Secure sync to WeNote® Cloud or Google Drive cloud storage. Never lose any notes
⬆️ Local backup and restore to keep notes safe
👨‍👧‍👧 Share notes to email, SMS, social networking & messaging apps
⏪ Undo/ redo enables mistake correction during note typing
🔗 Convert URL and phone number to clickable links
🖨️ Send notes to printer or export notes to PDF
🔎 Search notes and todo list, instantly

Color Notes
This notebook can categorize notes into different colors. Manage notes with 12 pre-defined beautiful colors. WeNote® also provides an unlimited favorite color.

Notes Category
WeNote® allows you to categorize notes by creating labels. Labels can display as Tabs, or menus based.

Calendar Memo
This notepad has a calendar. You can write a memo and create a reminder in the calendar. The calendar can display public holidays.

Due to its remarkable easy-to-use built-in calendar, you can use WeNote® as agenda planner and family organizer. Either plan next trip itinerary or schedule business meetings.

Secure Lock to Keep Notebook Private
This notepad can secure lock and keep notes private. Either lock a note or lock the entire app to keep the notebook safe.

Sticky Notes Home Widget
There are 5 different widgets. They are normal sticky notes, mini sticky notes, quick-add memos, calendar memos, and note list. Place the widgets on the home screen for quick access.

🎨 Unlimited notes color choices
📅 Reminders memo and calendar, with a lunar calendar
🛎 Powerful notes reminder. Notepad able to repeat daily, weekly, monthly, yearly, and highly customizable. Never miss anything from the notebook
🎉 Show holidays on the calendar notes, which supports up to 250 countries, 3,680 states & provinces
☁️ Secure sync to WeNote® Cloud or Google Drive cloud storage. Never lose any notes
⬆️ Local backup and restore to keep notes safe
👨‍👧‍👧 Share notes to email, SMS, social networking & messaging apps
⏪ Undo/ redo enables mistake correction during note typing
🔗 Convert URL and phone number to clickable links
🖨️ Send notes to printer or export notes to PDF
🔎 Search notes and todo list, instantly

Color Notes
This notebook can categorize notes into different colors. Manage notes with 12 pre-defined beautiful colors. WeNote® also provides an unlimited favorite color.

Notes Category
WeNote® allows you to categorize notes by creating labels. Labels can display as Tabs, or menus based.

Calendar Memo
This notepad has a calendar. You can write a memo and create a reminder in the calendar. The calendar can display public holidays.

Due to its remarkable easy-to-use built-in calendar, you can use WeNote® as agenda planner and family organizer. Either plan next trip itinerary or schedule business meetings.

Secure Lock to Keep Notebook Private
This notepad can secure lock and keep notes private. Either lock a note or lock the entire app to keep the notebook safe.

Sticky Notes Home Widget
There are 5 different widgets. They are normal sticky notes, mini sticky notes, quick-add memos, calendar memos, and note list. Place the widgets on the home screen for quick access.

WeNote® can act as a simple word processing app. You can type unlimited characters. After saving the note, you can pin it to the top screen, check off, password lock, stick to the notification bar, share or delete through the menu.

✔️🛒 How to Make Todo List or Shopping List?
In to-do list mode, you can add an unlimited checklist. Arrange their order with a simple tap and move. When finishing with an item, you can perform a simple tap to strikethrough it.

Features
📝 Create color notes and todo list
📁 Organize memo using label & color
🚀 Labels designed as tabs, to let you swipe between notes at blazing fast speed
🖼️ Attach photos and images into notebook
🖌️ Draw and paint inside the notepad
🎤 Voice recording allows hands-free note taking. You can add unlimited voice recordings into notepad
📌 Pin important notes to the top. Stick notes to the notification bar. You will not miss out on any important thing
🗒️ Place 5 different types of sticky note home widgets on the home screen
🔒 Secure lock notes and keep them private
✔️ The completed to-do list will move to the bottom of the checklist
👀 Customize notes via various fonts, viewing modes, sorting modes
🎀 11 different app color themes to make notebook looks great
🎨 Unlimited notes color choices
📅 Reminders memo and calendar, with a lunar calendar
🛎 Powerful notes reminder. Notepad able to repeat daily, weekly, monthly, yearly, and highly customizable. Never miss anything from the notebook
🎉 Show holidays on the calendar notes, which supports up to 250 countries, 3,680 states & provinces
☁️ Secure sync to WeNote® Cloud or Google Drive cloud storage. Never lose any notes
⬆️ Local backup and restore to keep notes safe
👨‍👧‍👧 Share notes to email, SMS, social networking & messaging apps
⏪ Undo/ redo enables mistake correction during note typing
🔗 Convert URL and phone number to clickable links
🖨️ Send notes to printer or export notes to PDF
🔎 Search notes and todo list, instantly

Color Notes
This notebook can categorize notes into different colors. Manage notes with 12 pre-defined beautiful colors. WeNote® also provides an unlimited favorite color.

Notes Category
WeNote® allows you to categorize notes by creating labels. Labels can display as Tabs, or menus based.

Calendar Memo
This notepad has a calendar. You can write a memo and create a reminder in the calendar. The calendar can display public holidays.

Due to its remarkable easy-to-use built-in calendar, you can use WeNote® as agenda planner and family organizer. Either plan next trip itinerary or schedule business meetings.

Secure Lock to Keep Notebook Private
This notepad can secure lock and keep notes private. Either lock a note or lock the entire app to keep the notebook safe.

Sticky Notes Home Widget
There are 5 different widgets. They are normal sticky notes, mini sticky notes, quick-add memos, calendar memos, and note list. Place the widgets on the home screen for quick access.

creator: Yocto Enterprise
descriptionHtml:
Easy to Use Notebook for Note Taking



⭐WeNote: Notes Notebook Notepad⭐ is a simple and awesome note taking app. You can create color notes, to do lists, shopping lists, reminders, and calendars quickly.

Users love WeNote® as their life organizer, work planner, or study note app. Note taking with WeNote® is easier than any other notepad, memo app.

When you write down memos, emails, phone numbers, messages, cooking recipes, diary, journal, shopping lists, and to do list, you will realize this is a good notes taking app. 😁

WeNote is a notepad that provides the best notes taking experience.

WeNote® is a privacy-focused notepad. WeNote® can work offline perfectly, even without an Internet connection. No login is required.

Lock notes and to do list via PIN, pattern, password, or fingerprint, to protect confidential information.

📝 How to Take a Note?
WeNote® can act as a simple word processing app. You can type unlimited characters. After saving the note, you can pin it to the top screen, check off, password lock, stick to the notification bar, share or delete through the menu.

✔️🛒 How to Make Todo List or Shopping List?
In to-do list mode, you can add an unlimited checklist. Arrange their order with a simple tap and move. When finishing with an item, you can perform a simple tap to strikethrough it.

Features
📝 Create color notes and todo list
📁 Organize memo using label & color
🚀 Labels designed as tabs, to let you swipe between notes at blazing fast speed
🖼️ Attach photos and images into notebook
🖌️ Draw and paint inside the notepad
🎤 Voice recording allows hands-free note taking. You can add unlimited voice recordings into notepad
📌 Pin important notes to the top. Stick notes to the notification bar. You will not miss out on any important thing
🗒️ Place 5 different types of sticky note home widgets on the home screen
🔒 Secure lock notes and keep them private
✔️ The completed to-do list will move to the bottom of the checklist
👀 Customize notes via various fonts, viewing modes, sorting modes
🎀 11 different app color themes to make notebook looks great
🎨 Unlimited notes color choices
📅 Reminders memo and calendar, with a lunar calendar
🛎 Powerful notes reminder. Notepad able to repeat daily, weekly, monthly, yearly, and highly customizable. Never miss anything from the notebook
🎉 Show holidays on the calendar notes, which supports up to 250 countries, 3,680 states & provinces
☁️ Secure sync to WeNote® Cloud or Google Drive cloud storage. Never lose any notes
⬆️ Local backup and restore to keep notes safe
👨‍👧‍👧 Share notes to email, SMS, social networking & messaging apps
⏪ Undo/ redo enables mistake correction during note typing
🔗 Convert URL and phone number to clickable links
🖨️ Send notes to printer or export notes to PDF
🔎 Search notes and todo list, instantly

Color Notes
This notebook can categorize notes into different colors. Manage notes with 12 pre-defined beautiful colors. WeNote® also provides an unlimited favorite color.

Notes Category
WeNote® allows you to categorize notes by creating labels. Labels can display as Tabs, or menus based.

Calendar Memo
This notepad has a calendar. You can write a memo and create a reminder in the calendar. The calendar can display public holidays.

Due to its remarkable easy-to-use built-in calendar, you can use WeNote® as agenda planner and family organizer. Either plan next trip itinerary or schedule business meetings.

Secure Lock to Keep Notebook Private
This notepad can secure lock and keep notes private. Either lock a note or lock the entire app to keep the notebook safe.

Sticky Notes Home Widget
There are 5 different widgets. They are normal sticky notes, mini sticky notes, quick-add memos, calendar memos, and note list. Place the widgets on the home screen for quick access.

---

FAQ: https://www.wenote.me/faq

Trello: https://trello.com/b/egVBdrmN

This notepad has a calendar. You can write a memo and create a reminder in the calendar. The calendar can display public holidays.

Due to its remarkable easy-to-use built-in calendar, you can use WeNote® as agenda planner and family organizer. Either plan next trip itinerary or schedule business meetings.

This notepad can secure lock and keep notes private. Either lock a note or lock the entire app to keep the notebook safe.

WeNote® is a privacy-focused notepad. WeNote® can work offline perfectly, even without an Internet connection. No login is required.

Lock notes and to do list via PIN, pattern, password, or fingerprint, to protect confidential information.

📝 How to Take a Note?
WeNote® can act as a simple word processing app. You can type unlimited characters. After saving the note, you can pin it to the top screen, check off, password lock, stick to the notification bar, share or delete through the menu.

✔️🛒 How to Make Todo List or Shopping List?
In to-do list mode, you can add an unlimited checklist. Arrange their order with a simple tap and move. When finishing with an item, you can perform a simple tap to strikethrough it.

Features
📝 Create color notes and todo list
📁 Organize memo using label & color
🚀 Labels designed as tabs, to let you swipe between notes at blazing fast speed
🖼️ Attach photos and images into notebook
🖌️ Draw and paint inside the notepad
🎤 Voice recording allows hands-free note taking. You can add unlimited voice recordings into notepad
📌 Pin important notes to the top. Stick notes to the notification bar. You will not miss out on any important thing
🗒️ Place 5 different types of sticky note home widgets on the home screen
🔒 Secure lock notes and keep them private
✔️ The completed to-do list will move to the bottom of the checklist
👀 Customize notes via various fonts, viewing modes, sorting modes
🎀 11 different app color themes to make notebook looks great

🛎 Powerful notes reminder. Notepad able to repeat daily, weekly, monthly, yearly, and highly customizable. Never miss anything from the notebook

☁️ Secure sync to WeNote® Cloud or Google Drive cloud storage. Never lose any notes
⬆️ Local backup and restore to keep notes safe
👨‍👧‍👧 Share notes to email, SMS, social networking & messaging apps
⏪ Undo/ redo enables mistake correction during note typing
🔗 Convert URL and phone number to clickable links
🖨️ Send notes to printer or export notes to PDF
🔎 Search notes and todo list, instantly

Notes Category

In to-do list mode, you can add an unlimited checklist. Arrange their order with a simple tap and move. When finishing with an item, you can perform a simple tap to strikethrough it.

📝 Create color notes and todo list
📁 Organize memo using label & color
🚀 Labels designed as tabs, to let you swipe between notes at blazing fast speed
🖼️ Attach photos and images into notebook

📌 Pin important notes to the top. Stick notes to the notification bar. You will not miss out on any important thing
🗒️ Place 5 different types of sticky note home widgets on the home screen
🔒 Secure lock notes and keep them private
✔️ The completed to-do list will move to the bottom of the checklist
👀 Customize notes via various fonts, viewing modes, sorting modes

creator: Notes & Notepad & Notebook
descriptionHtml:
Notes Made Easy

Looking for an easy-to-use notepad for quick note-taking? Need a convenient memo pad for to-do lists and shopping lists? Our free note-taking app and notebook provides all that with no full-screen ads!

⭐WeNote: Notes, Notebook, To do⭐ is a versatile note-taking app. Quickly create color notes, to-do lists, shopping lists, reminders, and calendars.

Users adore WeNote® for organizing their lives, planning work, or keeping study notes. It simplifies note-taking, making it more effortless than other notepad or memo apps.

From jotting down memos, emails, phone numbers, and recipes to maintaining a diary, shopping lists, and to-do lists, you'll find WeNote® exceptionally user-friendly. 😁

Prioritize your privacy with WeNote®. It functions seamlessly offline without any need for internet connectivity or login.

Ensure your notes' security by locking them using a PIN, pattern, password, or fingerprint, safeguarding your confidential information.

📝 How to Take a Note?
WeNote® functions as a straightforward word processor, allowing unlimited character input. Once a note is saved, you can pin it to the top, check it off, lock it with a password, stick it to the notification bar, or share and delete it via the menu.

✔️🛒 How to Make Todo List or Shopping List?
In to-do list mode, you can add unlimited checklist items. Simply tap and drag to rearrange them. Tap an item once you've finished it to strikethrough.

Features
🎨 Choose from unlimited note colors.
📝 Craft colorful notes and to-do lists.
📁 Organize memos with both labels and colors.
🚀 Swipe between notes effortlessly with labels designed as tabs.
🖼️ Easily attach photos and images to your notebook.
🖌️ Sketch and paint directly within the notepad.
🎤 Record voice memos hands-free with unlimited recording capacity.
📌 Pin crucial notes to the top and stick them to the notification bar for easy access.
🗒️ Display 5 distinct sticky note widgets on your home screen.
🔒 Keep your notes confidential with a secure lock.
✔️ Completed tasks move automatically to the bottom of your checklist.
👀 Personalize your notes with various fonts, viewing modes, and sorting options.
🎀 Choose from 11 vibrant app color themes for aesthetic appeal.
📅 Set reminders and view a calendar, complete with a lunar phase.
🛎 Never miss a memo with customizable, repeatable reminders.
🎉 Access a global holiday calendar supporting 250 countries and 3,680 regions.
☁️ Sync safely to WeNote® Cloud or Google Drive, ensuring no lost notes.
⬆️ Backup and restore locally for added note security.
👨‍👧‍👧 Share notes via email, SMS, and various messaging apps.
⏪ Undo/redo functionality ensures error-free note-taking.
🔗 Automatically convert URLs and phone numbers into clickable links.
🖨️ Send notes directly to a printer or export as PDF.
🔎 Instantly search through notes and to-do lists.

Various Home Widgets for Quick Access
There are 5 widgets: sticky notes, mini sticky notes, quick-add, calendar, and note list.

Color-Coded Personalization
This notebook lets you categorize notes with 12 pre-defined vibrant colors. Plus, WeNote® offers an option to choose your favorite color, giving you unlimited personalization.

Well Organized Notes
WeNote® allows you to categorize notes by creating labels. These labels can be displayed as Tabs or based on menus.

Calendar Memo to Keep Things Organized
This notepad features a built-in calendar, allowing you to jot down memos and set reminders easily. It even displays public holidays. Thanks to its intuitive design, you can use WeNote® as both an agenda planner and family organizer—perfect for planning trips or scheduling business meetings.

Secure Lock to Keep Notebook Private
Secure your notes with this notepad. Lock individual entries or the entire app to ensure your notebook's privacy.

Discover the joy of organized thoughts with WeNote® – your ultimate note-taking companion.
descriptionShort: Simple notepad & memo. Take notes, shopping list, to-do list, calendar, reminder

🎨 Choose from unlimited note colors.
📝 Craft colorful notes and to-do lists.
📁 Organize memos with both labels and colors.
🚀 Swipe between notes effortlessly with labels designed as tabs.
🖼️ Easily attach photos and images to your notebook.
🖌️ Sketch and paint directly within the notepad.
🎤 Record voice memos hands-free with unlimited recording capacity.
📌 Pin crucial notes to the top and stick them to the notification bar for easy access.
🗒️ Display 5 distinct sticky note widgets on your home screen.
🔒 Keep your notes confidential with a secure lock.
✔️ Completed tasks move automatically to the bottom of your checklist.
👀 Personalize your notes with various fonts, viewing modes, and sorting options.
🎀 Choose from 11 vibrant app color themes for aesthetic appeal.
📅 Set reminders and view a calendar, complete with a lunar phase.
🛎 Never miss a memo with customizable, repeatable reminders.
🎉 Access a global holiday calendar supporting 250 countries and 3,680 regions.
☁️ Sync safely to WeNote® Cloud or Google Drive, ensuring no lost notes.
⬆️ Backup and restore locally for added note security.
👨‍👧‍👧 Share notes via email, SMS, and various messaging apps.
⏪ Undo/redo functionality ensures error-free note-taking.
🔗 Automatically convert URLs and phone numbers into clickable links.
🖨️ Send notes directly to a printer or export as PDF.
🔎 Instantly search through notes and to-do lists.

Various Home Widgets for Quick Access
There are 5 widgets: sticky notes, mini sticky notes, quick-add, calendar, and note list.

Color-Coded Personalization
This notebook lets you categorize notes with 12 pre-defined vibrant colors. Plus, WeNote® offers an option to choose your favorite color, giving you unlimited personalization.

Well Organized Notes
WeNote® allows you to categorize notes by creating labels. These labels can be displayed as Tabs or based on menus.

Calendar Memo to Keep Things Organized
This notepad features a built-in calendar, allowing you to jot down memos and set reminders easily. It even displays public holidays. Thanks to its intuitive design, you can use WeNote® as both an agenda planner and family organizer—perfect for planning trips or scheduling business meetings.

Secure Lock to Keep Notebook Private
Secure your notes with this notepad. Lock individual entries or the entire app to ensure your notebook's privacy.

From jotting down memos, emails, phone numbers, and recipes to maintaining a diary, shopping lists, and to-do lists, you'll find WeNote® exceptionally user-friendly. 😁

Prioritize your privacy with WeNote®. It functions seamlessly offline without any need for internet connectivity or login.

creator: Notes & Notepad & Notebook
descriptionHtml:
Notes Made Easy

Looking for an easy-to-use notepad for quick note-taking? Need a convenient memo pad for to-do lists and shopping lists? Our free note-taking app and notebook provides all that with no full-screen ads!

⭐WeNote: Notes, Notebook, To do⭐ is a versatile note-taking app. Quickly create color notes, to-do lists, shopping lists, reminders, and calendars.

Users adore WeNote® for organizing their lives, planning work, or keeping study notes. It simplifies note-taking, making it more effortless than other notepad or memo apps.

From jotting down memos, emails, phone numbers, and recipes to maintaining a diary, shopping lists, and to-do lists, you'll find WeNote® exceptionally user-friendly. 😁

Prioritize your privacy with WeNote®. It functions seamlessly offline without any need for internet connectivity or login.

Ensure your notes' security by locking them using a PIN, pattern, password, or fingerprint, safeguarding your confidential information.

📝 How to Take a Note?
WeNote® functions as a straightforward word processor, allowing unlimited character input. Once a note is saved, you can pin it to the top, check it off, lock it with a password, stick it to the notification bar, or share and delete it via the menu.

✔️🛒 How to Make Todo List or Shopping List?
In to-do list mode, you can add unlimited checklist items. Simply tap and drag to rearrange them. Tap an item once you've finished it to strikethrough.

Features
🎨 Choose from unlimited note colors.
📝 Craft colorful notes and to-do lists.
📁 Organize memos with both labels and colors.
🚀 Swipe between notes effortlessly with labels designed as tabs.
🖼️ Easily attach photos and images to your notebook.
🖌️ Sketch and paint directly within the notepad.
🎤 Record voice memos hands-free with unlimited recording capacity.
📌 Pin crucial notes to the top and stick them to the notification bar for easy access.
🗒️ Display 5 distinct sticky note widgets on your home screen.
🔒 Keep your notes confidential with a secure lock.
✔️ Completed tasks move automatically to the bottom of your checklist.
👀 Personalize your notes with various fonts, viewing modes, and sorting options.
🎀 Choose from 11 vibrant app color themes for aesthetic appeal.
📅 Set reminders and view a calendar, complete with a lunar phase.
🛎 Never miss a memo with customizable, repeatable reminders.
🎉 Access a global holiday calendar supporting 250 countries and 3,680 regions.
☁️ Sync safely to WeNote® Cloud or Google Drive, ensuring no lost notes.
⬆️ Backup and restore locally for added note security.
👨‍👧‍👧 Share notes via email, SMS, and various messaging apps.
⏪ Undo/redo functionality ensures error-free note-taking.
🔗 Automatically convert URLs and phone numbers into clickable links.
🖨️ Send notes directly to a printer or export as PDF.
🔎 Instantly search through notes and to-do lists.

Various Home Widgets for Quick Access
There are 5 widgets: sticky notes, mini sticky notes, quick-add, calendar, and note list.

Color-Coded Personalization
This notebook lets you categorize notes with 12 pre-defined vibrant colors. Plus, WeNote® offers an option to choose your favorite color, giving you unlimited personalization.

Well Organized Notes
WeNote® allows you to categorize notes by creating labels. These labels can be displayed as Tabs or based on menus.

Calendar Memo to Keep Things Organized
This notepad features a built-in calendar, allowing you to jot down memos and set reminders easily. It even displays public holidays. Thanks to its intuitive design, you can use WeNote® as both an agenda planner and family organizer—perfect for planning trips or scheduling business meetings.

Secure Lock to Keep Notebook Private
Secure your notes with this notepad. Lock individual entries or the entire app to ensure your notebook's privacy.

Discover the joy of organized thoughts with WeNote® – your ultimate note-taking companion.
descriptionShort: Simple notepad & memo. Take notes, shopping list, to-do list, calendar, reminder

descriptionHtml:
Notes Made Easy

Looking for an easy-to-use notepad for quick note-taking? Need a convenient memo pad for to-do lists and shopping lists? Our free note-taking app and notebook provides all that with no full-screen ads!

⭐WeNote: Notes, Notebook, To do⭐ is a versatile note-taking app. Quickly create color notes, to-do lists, shopping lists, reminders, and calendars.

Users adore WeNote® for organizing their lives, planning work, or keeping study notes. It simplifies note-taking, making it more effortless than other notepad or memo apps.

From jotting down memos, emails, phone numbers, and recipes to maintaining a diary, shopping lists, and to-do lists, you'll find WeNote® exceptionally user-friendly. 😁

Prioritize your privacy with WeNote®. It functions seamlessly offline without any need for internet connectivity or login.

Ensure your notes' security by locking them using a PIN, pattern, password, or fingerprint, safeguarding your confidential information.

📝 How to Take a Note?
WeNote® functions as a straightforward word processor, allowing unlimited character input. Once a note is saved, you can pin it to the top, check it off, lock it with a password, stick it to the notification bar, or share and delete it via the menu.

✔️🛒 How to Make Todo List or Shopping List?
In to-do list mode, you can add unlimited checklist items. Simply tap and drag to rearrange them. Tap an item once you've finished it to strikethrough.

Features
🎨 Choose from unlimited note colors.
📝 Craft colorful notes and to-do lists.
📁 Organize memos with both labels and colors.
🚀 Swipe between notes effortlessly with labels designed as tabs.
🖼️ Easily attach photos and images to your notebook.
🖌️ Sketch and paint directly within the notepad.
🎤 Record voice memos hands-free with unlimited recording capacity.
📌 Pin crucial notes to the top and stick them to the notification bar for easy access.
🗒️ Display 5 distinct sticky note widgets on your home screen.
🔒 Keep your notes confidential with a secure lock.
✔️ Completed tasks move automatically to the bottom of your checklist.
👀 Personalize your notes with various fonts, viewing modes, and sorting options.
🎀 Choose from 11 vibrant app color themes for aesthetic appeal.
📅 Set reminders and view a calendar, complete with a lunar phase.
🛎 Never miss a memo with customizable, repeatable reminders.
🎉 Access a global holiday calendar supporting 250 countries and 3,680 regions.
☁️ Sync safely to WeNote® Cloud or Google Drive, ensuring no lost notes.
⬆️ Backup and restore locally for added note security.
👨‍👧‍👧 Share notes via email, SMS, and various messaging apps.
⏪ Undo/redo functionality ensures error-free note-taking.
🔗 Automatically convert URLs and phone numbers into clickable links.
🖨️ Send notes directly to a printer or export as PDF.
🔎 Instantly search through notes and to-do lists.

Various Home Widgets for Quick Access
There are 5 widgets: sticky notes, mini sticky notes, quick-add, calendar, and note list.

Color-Coded Personalization
This notebook lets you categorize notes with 12 pre-defined vibrant colors. Plus, WeNote® offers an option to choose your favorite color, giving you unlimited personalization.

This notepad features a built-in calendar, allowing you to jot down memos and set reminders easily. It even displays public holidays. Thanks to its intuitive design, you can use WeNote® as both an agenda planner and family organizer—perfect for planning trips or scheduling business meetings.

Secure Lock to Keep Notebook Private
Secure your notes with this notepad. Lock individual entries or the entire app to ensure your notebook's privacy.
